reviewText: If you're purchasing these for adult viewing only, then it's fun to see the old cartoons and work on your Spanish. However, if purchasing for a child I do not recommend these.  As an adult I realize now the inappropriate references in these old cartoons, let's just say they're not as PC as today's standards.  Be forewarned that there are questionable things so if you are letting your child watch it you should also watch it with them to explain anything.  It's not something you can just sit your kid down to watch while you go do chores or cook dinner, remember these are from a totally different era so even though it's in Spanish, there's a lot of violence and inappropriate behavior, at least by today's standards.
